insights: 🔴 CRITICAL: Win rate extremely low - model may be overfitting or criteria too strict
🔴 CRITICAL: Significant losses - model not viable for live trading
🟡 WARNING: High drawdown - consider tighter risk controls
🔴 CRITICAL: Profit factor < 1.0 - losing more than winning
recommendations: 🎯 Relax entry criteria - current thresholds too strict
🔄 Try ensemble learning with multiple models
💰 Increase take-profit targets relative to stop-loss
🛡️ Implement trailing stops to protect profits
📉 Reduce position sizes during drawdown periods
🎲 Add position sizing based on Kelly Criterion
⏰ Avoid trading during high-impact news events
🔄 Use correlation filters to avoid overexposure
